ğŸ” Whatâ€™s New in Core Bluetooth

  • IntroductionÂ 
    - Health care, Fitness, Toy with playground

    - Build-in Profiles (Apple Notification Center Service, Apple Media Service, MIDI over Bluetooth Low Energy, iBeacon, Current Time Service, HID Over GATT)
    Â 
    - GATT DataBaseÂ 
    ( CBService [CBCharacteristic, CBCharacteristic, CBCharacteristic] )
  • Enhanced reliabilityÂ 
    - Backgrounded AppÂ 
    (Background Modesì—ì„œ Uses Bluetooth LE accessories, Acts as a Bluetooth LE accessory í™œì„±í™”)
    Â 
    - CBCentralManager restoration
    Â 
    - Reading Characteristics as a Central
    Â Central operations can continue when your app is not running (Scan for new devices with services, Connect to an already known device)
    Â Peripheral operations can continue when your app is not running (Publish local services, Advertise service UUID)
    Â 
    - State Preservation and Restoration [ NEWÂ ! ]
    Try to ask for as few system resources as possible
    Â Background activities will be stopped if User force quits the app or User disables Bluetooth
    Â Write With out response (canSendWriteWithoutResponse, peripheralIsReady ì°¸ê³ )
  • Platform supportÂ 
    - macOS 10.7, iOS 5, tvOS 9, watchOS 4
    Â 
    - iOS + macOSÂ 
    (Fore / Back ground apps, Central and Peripheral, 15ms minimum connection interval, State Preservation and Restoration on iOS)
    Â 
    - tvOS (Foreground Only, Central role only, Limited to 2 simultaneous connections, 30ms minimum connection interval, Peripherals disconnected when app is moved to the background)
    Â 
    - watchOS (Access dictated by system runtime policies, Central role only, Limited to 2 simultaneous connections, 30ms minimum connection interval, Peripherals disconnected when app is suspended, Supported on Apple Watch Series 2)
    Â 
    - L2CAP Channels (Firmware update ê°™ì€ ë§ì€ Data ì „ì†¡ì— ì í•©. Socket í†µì‹  ë¹„ìŠ·, Sample code í•„ìˆ˜ ì°¸ì¡° )ğŸ‘
    Â Bluetooth SIG Protocol underlying all communication
    Â Logical Link Control and Adaptation Protocol
    Â Stream between two devices
    Â Introduced for LE in Bluetooth Core Spec 4.1
  • Best PracticeÂ 
    - Follow the Bluetooth Accessory Design Guidelines for Apple Products (ìˆ˜ë…„ê°„ ì‹œí–‰ì°©ì˜¤ë¥¼ ì˜ ì •ë¦¬í•´ë†¨ë‹¤.)

    Â Use as few services/ characteristics as possible
    Â Group services by UUID size
